author: Football Italia staff
title: Diaconale: 'Anti-Lazio media in unison'
description: Director of communications Arturo Diaconale claims “the media move in unison to criticise Lazio and President Claudio Lotito. There is an anti-Lazio conformity.”
content:
Director of communications Arturo Diaconale claims “the media move in unison to criticise Lazio and President Claudio Lotito. There is an anti-Lazio conformity.”
The Aquile have been the most vocal in trying to resume training even as the coronavirus pandemi… [+2087 chars]
